subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The Kansas and the North Carolina men’s teams, regulars at the top of the national poll, were recognized on another list. The teams, which met in the Final Four earlier this month, were included among 712 squads in various sports singled out by the N.C.A.A. for their solid academic performance. The Ivy League had 150 men’s and women’s teams on the list. The Patriot League was second with 89 and the Big East third at 47.
